description: Italy's capital wants to protect the animals, but some say it doesn't go far enough.
title: Rome bans horse-drawn carriages from its streets
title_page: Rome bans horse-drawn carriages from its streets - BBC News
maintext: "You will never again see tired horses on the streets of the city during the hottest hours of the summer months, because we have expressly forbidden it," Ms Raggi wrote on Facebook.
